Package sample

Class OrganizationPanelController

java.lang.Object
sample.LogINpanelController
sample.OrganizationPanelController
Direct Known Subclasses:
UpdateOrgController
public class OrganizationPanelController
extends LogINpanelController
This is the Class that handling the Organization Panel controller. The Class extends the LogINpanelController and handles the components of the sample.OrganizationPanel.fxml file.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This is the initializing function of the fxml components. When a the window is launched this method initializes these components. Establishes the connection with the database and upon fetching the data columns works with the property values.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class LogINpanelController

    • pressBack

      public void pressBack​(javafx.event.ActionEvent even) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is here for the functionality of the "Back" button. This will redirect the user to the parent node that is the "root" which is sample.UserPanel.fxml. This hierarchical structure is for the simplicity of the system.
      Overrides:
      pressBack in class LogINpanelController
      Parameters:
      even - which is an object of ActionEvent Class refers to the event of action for the method
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - which is a checked exception. Used to identify errors in i/p and o/p of a particular workflow.

    • PressUpdateProfile

      public void PressUpdateProfile​(javafx.event.ActionEvent even) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is for the updating of the Profile of the Organization. The button press loads the sample.UpdateOrg.fxml.
      Parameters:

      public void PressAsDonor​(javafx.event.ActionEvent even) throws java.io.IOException
